EmailTemplate.description: Use this template to send a Salesforce Survey invitation after a case has been closed
EmailTemplate.name: *Case Closed Email Template with Salesforce Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Case {!Case.CaseNumber} "{!Case.Subject}" is closed.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting us! I've closed your case {!Case.CaseNumber} "{!Case.Subject}". If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to reply to this email or visit the {!Organization.Name} Community.
We are always looking to improve our customer service, so would you mind taking this brief survey about your experience?
Customer Experience Survey
Thank you! {!Organization.Name} Customer Service
